author: jmonkevicius
body:
- Updated database from MySQL to MariaDB 10.0.12 version.
- Updated py2-mysqldb to newer 1.2.4b4 version.
- Updated  py2-mysqldb-setup.patch for correct py2-mysqldb working with new mysqldb version.
- Removed mysql.spec file
- Removed "required mysql " from crabserver.spec

It was tested only in SLC6 and pushed to comp_gcc481 branch.
It was tested also with SQLAlchemy 0.9.6 version [ https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/1029 ]. Not with 0.5.2 version.
It was tested also with cx_Oracle 5.1.3 version [ https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/1030 ]. Not with 5.1 version.

In WMAgent deployment case, before starting MariaDB services, need to change deployment file [ https://github.com/jmonkevicius/deployment/commit/fb33c9e12365d760b0ca27075d0fd5285df77503 ]. 
Reason: new version of database don't understand simbols "set-variable" . Seting my.cnf parameters at mariadb.spec file is not working because deployment script [  https://github.com/dmwm/deployment ] is overwriting this config file.
